table.caption: Table 127 â€” PDF halftone types
head: Type
Meaning
rows: Defines a single halftone screen by a frequency, angle, and spot function.

Defines an arbitrary number of halftone screens, one for each colourant or colour component (including both primary and spot colourants). The keys in this dictionary are names of colourants; the values are halftone dictionaries of other types, each defining the halftone screen for a single colourant.
Defines a single halftone screen by a threshold array containing 8-bit sample values.
Defines a single halftone screen by a threshold array containing 8-bit sample values, representing a halftone cell that may have a non-zero screen angle.
(PDF 1.3) Defines a single halftone screen by a threshold array containing 16-bit sample values, representing a halftone cell that may have a non-zero screen angle.
